item.title: My Server Setup Process
item.description: Earlier, I posted about how I set up servers hosted at CloudAtCost. There have been a few changes to that process. Rather than continually patching that post, here’s a new description. Again, this is for Ubuntu 14.04 which gets upgraded to 16.04 as part of the setup.
